items.content_html: A lightweight web-based simulator for controlling a UAV using Python code. This app features a real-time 3D drone visualization, motor thrust plots, and a built-in code editor, allowing users to test flight logic directly in the browser. Ideal for testing drone dynamics, control systems, and autonomous flight.
items.title: Rakshan-VP/Quadcopter-sim: A lightweight web-based simulator for controlling a UAV using Python code. Ideal for testing drone dynamics, control systems, and autonomous flight.

items.content_html: A simple alternative to the mv command, designed to handle file renaming when a file with the target name already exists. move automatically adds an index or number to the file name to prevent conflicts. Lightweight and dependency-free.

items.content_html: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.

items.content_html: Text-Tab-Organizer a lightweight Chrome extension that lets you quickly save short text inputs and browser tabs with timestamps. Easily organize your text and links in one place with options to delete your saved items. Perfect for users who want a simple, efficient way to keep track of ideas and quick thoughts without leaving the browser.
